snippet: A widening criminal probe casts new light on a bitter defeat hedge fund activist Bill Ackman suffered in his 2009 bid for board seats at U.S. retailer Target Corp....
lead_paragraph: A widening criminal probe casts new light on a bitter defeat hedge fund activist Bill Ackman suffered in his 2009 bid for board seats at U.S. retailer Target Corp.

headline.main: Criminal Probe Casts 2009 Ackman-Target Boardroom Brawl in New Light
headline.print_headline: Criminal Probe Casts 2009 Ackman-Target Boardroom Brawl in New Light
